security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based roleplay skill containing only Markdown content. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution. This is a narrative interactive fiction scenario with zero security risk.

content.value_statement: Guide astronaut Stella through an engineering challenge to repair a signal tower and contact Earth. Make decisions that affect the story outcome in this interactive sci-fi adventure.
actual_capabilities: Guide Stella through signal tower repair planning and execution
Help make decisions on resource gathering and engineering solutions
Explore multiple story branches based on your choices
Experience emotional narrative about hope, belonging, and connection
Encounter ethical dilemmas about what information to share with Earth
Progress through a complete chapter in a 12-part sci-fi story
limitations: Cannot execute code or perform real technical tasks
Limited to text-based roleplay interaction only
No real-time signal or communication capabilities
Story outcomes are determined by AI narrative, not user actions

use_cases.title: Sci-Fi Adventure Story
use_cases.description: Experience a narrative chapter where you guide an astronaut through survival and discovery

use_cases.title: Character Dialogue Practice
use_cases.description: Learn character voice techniques through observing Stella's unique speaking style

use_cases.title: Bilingual Conversation
use_cases.description: Practice English through natural dialogue with a character who mixes Chinese and English

prompt_templates.title: Start the Chapter
prompt_templates.prompt: I want to help Stella with the signal tower project. What should we do first?

prompt_templates.title: Resource Planning
prompt_templates.prompt: What materials does Stella need for the signal tower and how can we find them?

prompt_templates.title: Ethical Decision
prompt_templates.prompt: Should Stella tell Earth about the alien civilization ruins she discovered? What are the implications?

prompt_templates.title: Explore All Routes
prompt_templates.prompt: What happens if we try to make the signal tower more powerful? What if we receive an unexpected response?

output_examples.input: What should we do first for the signal tower?
output: Stella shows you the damaged communication panel
Together you assess the damaged antenna array and missing signal amplifier
She explains her plan to use cave crystals as replacements
You discuss whether building a relay tower on the distant hill is worth the effort

best_practices: Ask follow-up questions to explore Stella's thoughts and emotions
Consider both technical and ethical implications of your suggestions
Engage with the narrative to discover different story outcomes
anti_patterns: Asking the skill to execute real code or perform technical tasks
Expecting the skill to actually send signals or communicate externally
Treating this as a utility tool rather than an interactive story experience

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Claude tools?
faq.answer: Yes, it works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It provides a roleplay experience regardless of which tool you use.

faq.question: How long does this chapter take to complete?
faq.answer: Approximately 35-45 minutes of interactive storytelling, depending on how deeply you explore the narrative.

faq.question: Can I continue to other chapters afterward?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill connects to other chapters like escape-plan, alien-encounter, and daily-science based on story outcomes.

faq.question: Does this skill collect or store my data?
faq.answer: No, this is a prompt-only skill. No data is collected, stored, or transmitted. All interactions stay within your conversation.

faq.question: Why is the character mixing Chinese and English?
faq.answer: Stella Chen is a Chinese astronaut who speaks both languages naturally. This reflects her character background and adds authenticity.

faq.question: How is this different from other roleplay skills?
faq.answer: This is part of a larger 12-chapter narrative adventure. Your choices influence story outcomes across multiple connected chapters.
